LanguageData.CrashedPsychicEmanatorShipPart.label: crashed ship part
LanguageData.CrashedPsychicEmanatorShipPart.descripti: A mysterious crashed piece of a spaceship. It may contain exotic materials, computers, even AI personas. This kind of technology can be dangerous.
LanguageData.CrashedPoisonShipPart.label: crashed poison ship part
LanguageData.CrashedPoisonShipPart.description: A mysterious crashed piece of a spaceship. It may contain exotic materials, computers, even AI personas. This one seems to be poisoning the ground around it.
LanguageData.ShipChunk.label: ship chunk
LanguageData.ShipChunk.description: A chunk of a spacecraft. Can be deconstructed to yield useful steel and components.
